column2:
"Yeah, you've passed the special trial.
You're advancing well.
Aim for the highest levels."

"But you must continue to devote yourself. Idleness
is ever your enemy. You'll only reach your ultimate
goal through honest effort."

"Anyone can dream of becoming the ultimate
talis master. It's another thing to actually
do it. Keep up the good work."

"うむ、特訓内容は合格だ。
順調に昇っているようだな
はるかな高みへの階段を。"

"精進を忘れず、驕りもせずに
愚直に努力を続けていれば
君ならばきっと辿り着けるだろう。"

"そう……誰もが夢見る
タリス使いの頂点へ。
それまで、頑張るんだぞ！"
